[[inst_lhi_u]]
==== LHI.U

*Syntax:* lhi.u [SrcL, simm], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load unsigned 16-bit halfword from memory.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lhi_u.svg[LHI.U encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/UNSCALED
